reporter_caption.center: NATIONAL AM. BK., NEW ORL. v. SOUTHCOAST CONTRAC., 279 So.2d 694 (La. 1973)

caption.center: NATIONAL AMERICAN BANK OF NEW ORLEANS v. SOUTHCOAST CONTRACTORS, INC.,

opinion.posture: In re: American Employers Insurance Company applying for certiorari or writ of review to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, Parish of East Baton Rouge.
opinion.opinion_text: [1] Writ refused. On the facts found by the Court of Appeal, the result is correct.West Page 695
